lyric:
[by:是大饼啊]
[ti:Be My Valentine]
[ar:Tim McMorris]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:06.44]Won’t you be my
[00:08.61]Won’t you be my
[00:10.70]Won’t you be my valentine
[00:14.18]Because I adore you
[00:15.87]I’d give anything for you
[00:18.11]You make me smile, smile, smile
[00:21.93]And when I’m around you
[00:23.68]Things get kinda hazy
[00:25.42]Because I am crazy,
[00:27.31]Crazy for you
[00:29.40]I cannot describe it
[00:30.94]Except that I am in love
[00:32.73]Yeah, I’m feeling feelings
[00:34.97]Feelings for you
[00:39.15]And now I’ll shout to the world my love for you
[00:42.59]The irresistible love that I’ve fallen into
[00:47.07]Life is wonderful, cause you shine through
[00:50.70]There’s no one that makes me feel like you do
[00:54.03]And I will sing because your beautiful in all that you are
[00:57.81]Like a clear night sky graced by a shooting bright star
[01:01.95]So, won’t you be my, won’t you be my
[01:06.22]Won’t you be my sweet valentine
[01:10.11]Oh and, I will stay true
[01:12.25]I will stay true, I will stay true, true to you
[01:17.74]From the day that I met ya’, I couldn’t forget ya’
[01:21.71]You stuck in my mind, mind, mind
[01:25.54]Every time that you laugh, every time that you smile
[01:29.42]My heart it melts, I could stay here a while
[01:32.76]And it’s pure satisfaction, the kind of attraction
[01:36.49]Chemical reaction, I have in my heart
[01:41.17]And now I’ll shout to the world my love for you
[01:44.60]The irresistible love that I’ve fallen into
[01:49.03]Life is wonderful, cause you shine through
[01:52.26]There’s no one that makes me feel like you do
[01:56.00]And I will sing because your beautiful in all that you are
[01:59.83]Like a clear night sky graced by a shooting bright star
[02:03.96]So, won’t you be my, won’t you be my
[02:06.80]Won't you be my
[02:12.02]Sweet Valentine
tlyric:
[by:SuperShake]
[00:06.44]你愿意吗?
[00:08.61]你同意吗?
[00:10.70]做我心爱的人好吗?
[00:14.18]只因我爱慕你
[00:15.87]我愿意把一切都给你
[00:18.11]你让我欢笑,快乐,喜悦
[00:21.93]当我在你身边
[00:23.68]一切都变得那样暧昧朦胧
[00:25.42]因为我变得疯狂
[00:27.31]因你而狂
[00:29.40]这种情绪难以形容
[00:30.94]只能说我坠入了爱河
[00:32.73]是的,我在回味那种感觉
[00:34.97]那种想你的感觉
[00:39.15]现在我要向全世界宣告我对你的爱
[00:42.59]那不可抗拒的,我所深陷的爱
[00:47.07]生活如此美妙,正是因为我有你的光芒
[00:50.70]没有任何人能像你一样使我拥有这样的感受
[00:54.03]我要为你而唱,因为你的美丽以及你的一切
[00:57.81]就像明亮的夜晚被闪耀的明星装饰一般
[01:01.95]那么,你愿意吗?你同意吗?
[01:06.22]做我心爱的人好吗?
[01:10.11]噢,我会对你一直保持真实
[01:12.25]保持忠诚,坦诚相待,只为你一人
[01:17.74]从遇见你的那天起,我就不可能再忘记你
[01:21.71]你一直深深地在我的脑海里
[01:25.54]每次当你开心,每次当你微笑
[01:29.42]我的心都要融化,连一刻也待不了
[01:32.76]这种纯粹的满足感,这种独特的吸引力
[01:36.49]这种奇妙的化学反应,都深深印在我心里
[01:41.17]现在我要向全世界宣告我对你的爱
[01:44.60]那不可抗拒的,我所深陷的爱
[01:49.03]生活如此美妙,正是因为我有你的光芒
[01:52.26]没有任何人能像你一样使我拥有这样的感受
[01:56.00]我要为你而唱,因为你的美丽以及你的一切
[01:59.83]就像明亮的夜晚被闪耀的明星装饰一般
[02:03.96]那么,你愿意吗?你同意吗?
[02:06.80]做我心爱的人好吗?
[02:12.02]最甜蜜的,最心爱的人
